柷字的基本解释

柷
zhù
古代打击乐器，像方匣子，用木头做成，奏乐开始时敲打。
古书上说的一种树。

柷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhù］
［《廣韻》之六切，入屋，章。］
［《廣韻》昌六切，入屋，昌。］
亦作“拀1”。
古乐器名。木制，形如方斗。奏乐开始时击之。

柷字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　柷； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页521第09
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?昌六切，音俶。【說文】樂，木空也，所以止音爲節。【書·益稷謨】合止柷敔。【註】柷狀如桼桶，方二尺四寸，深一尺八寸。中有椎柄，連厎挏之，令左右擊。郭璞云：樂之初，擊柷以作之。樂之末，戛敔以止之。　又【廣韻】之六切，音祝。義同。　又【類篇】木名。【爾雅·釋木】柷，州木。髦，柔英。

柷字的起名意思

古乐器名。木制，形如方斗。奏乐开始时击之。

zhu
Basic explanation of words
zhu
zhù
An ancient percussion instrument, like a square box, was made of wood and struck at the beginning of the music.
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
zhu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhù］
[Six cuts of "Guangyun", entering the house, chapter. ]
["Guang Yun" Chang six cuts, enter the house, Chang. ]
Also known as "拀1".
Ancient musical instrument name. Wooden, shaped like a square bucket. Hit it when the music starts.
zhu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　柷; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 521 09
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Chang six cuts, sound Qi. [Speaking Wen] Music, Mu Kong also, so the silence is a knot. 【Book·Yijimo】Combine together. [Note] The shape is like a bucket, measuring two feet and four inches in square and one foot and eight inches in depth. There is a vertebral handle in the middle, which can be clicked to make left and right strikes. Guo Puyun: At the beginning of music, hit the jade to make it. At the end of the music, stop at it.　[Guangyun] Six Cuts, Sound Wishes. The same meaning.　[Classes] Wooden name. [Erya·Shimu] Tu, Zhoumu. Fashion, Rouying.
zhu

Old glyph
zhu
Name meaning
Ancient musical instrument name. Wooden, shaped like a square bucket. Hit it when the music starts.
zhù, chù
1) zhù *кит. муз. чжу (резонирующий ящик с узким дном и широким верхом, для подачи сигнала о начале музыки)
2) chù 用于人名，如唐哀帝李柷
